task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Continue reading below to learn how to use the Numbers app to subtract two numbers.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know the basics of mathematical operations.

context.p: Follow the steps below to find the difference between two numbers:

taskbody.result: The result of the subtraction is displayed.

example.p: Lets say you want to find the difference between 6 and 2. To do so, the mathematical operation will look like this: 6-2=4. Using the app, enter 6 followed by the minus button. Next, enter 2. Press the equals button.
The result "4" is displayed on the screen.
